name: Stranger Fish
description:
Welcome to Stranger Fish ! 

You love exploration ? You love funny fish design ? Then, I think you would like our game ! 

On Stranger Fish, you can control a submarine with a shark design (we call it the Sharkmarine). You can go down deeper and deeper to find many imaginary fish, some of them are cute, some of them are funny and other are creepy ! 

The goal is to find all of them the fastest as you can, your best score will be displayed on the main screen if you want to challenge you to beat it again. 

We hope that you will enjoy your exploration and will like our funny little fishes !
